                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Inherited instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Undocumented instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .asStream

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .embedInStream(inval)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .key

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .key = value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .repeats

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        .repeats = value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        helpfile source: /usr/share/SuperCollider/HelpSource/Classes/Pkey.schelp
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        link::Classes/Pkey::

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Place:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        Filter:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • Description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Inherited class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Inherited instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Undocumented instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • embedInStream
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          • Examples
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Classes | Streams-Patterns-Events > Patterns > List

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Place : Pseq : ListPattern : Pattern : AbstractFunction : Object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            interlaced embedding of subarrays
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Source: ListPatterns.sc
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            See also: Ppatlace

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Returns elements in the list. If an element is an array itself, it embeds the first element when it comes by first time, the second element when it comes by the second time... The nth when it comes by the nth time.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Class Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Inherited class methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Instance Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Inherited instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Undocumented instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            .embedInStream(inval)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            helpfile source: /usr/share/SuperCollider/HelpSource/Classes/Place.schelp
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            link::Classes/Place::

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Pn:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            Filter:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • new
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Inherited class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Inherited instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Undocumented instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • embedInStream
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • key
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • repeats
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            • Examples
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Classes | Streams-Patterns-Events > Patterns > Repetition

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Pn : FilterPattern : Pattern : AbstractFunction : Object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              repeatedly embed a pattern
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Source: FilterPatterns.sc
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Subclasses: Pgate
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              See also: Pdup

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Class Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Pn.new(pattern, repeats: inf, key)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Arguments:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              pattern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              the pattern to repeat

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              repeats

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Repeats the enclosed pattern repeats times.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              key

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              If key is non-nil, it sets the value of that key to true whenever it restarts the pattern. This can be used to advance Patterns enclosed by Pgate.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Inherited class methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Instance Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Inherited instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Undocumented instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              .embedInStream(event)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              .key

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              .key = value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              .repeats

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              .repeats = value

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              helpfile source: /usr/share/SuperCollider/HelpSource/Classes/Pn.schelp
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              link::Classes/Pn::

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Ppar:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              Filter:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              • Description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • new
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Inherited class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Inherited instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Undocumented instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • embedInStream
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • initStreams
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                • Examples
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Classes | Streams-Patterns-Events > Patterns > Parallel

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ppar : ListPattern : Pattern : AbstractFunction : Object

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  embed event streams in parallel
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Source: Ppar.sc
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Subclasses: Pgpar, Ptpar
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  See also: Pgpar, Pbus, Pgroup

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Description

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Embeds several event streams so that they form a single output stream with all their events in temporal order. When one stream ends, the other streams are further embedded until all have ended.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Class Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Ppar.new(list, repeats: 1)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  From superclass: ListPattern

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Arguments:

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  list

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  list of patterns or streams.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  repeats

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  repeat the whole pattern n times.

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Inherited class methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Instance Methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Inherited instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Undocumented instance methods

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  .embedInStream(inval)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  .initStreams(priorityQ)

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Examples

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  helpfile source: /usr/share/SuperCollider/HelpSource/Classes/Ppar.schelp
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  link::Classes/Ppar::

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  ProxySpace:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  Filter:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  • Description
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • First Example
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Creation
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • new
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • push
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • pop
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • clearAll
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Inherited class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Undocumented class methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • all
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • findSpace
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    • Instance methods
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      • Play back and access
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • play
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • record
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • ar kr
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • wakeUp
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • fadeTime
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • clock
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • quant

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • stop

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • clear
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        • add
